oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Five pistol rounds, 1 lead bullet surrounded by wood, and other debris from Big Creek in Hawkins County, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These items were recovered from the battle site at Big Creek in Hawkins County, Tennessee. The battle was fought November 6, 1863 between Garrard's Union Cavalry and Grumble Jones Confederate Cavalry. Items include five .44 caliber round balls, a lead bullet surrounded by wood and other chuncks of lead from the battle.
